full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Project Administrator for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)**

**Reference Number:** CB-132-91580184

The Government of Canada's Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) department is seeking a qualified project administrator to manage various projects and tasks on behalf of the department.

**Project Description**

The selected contractor will be responsible for acting as the primary point of contact for internal client emails, tracking and responding to emails, and maintaining project information on the Environment and Climate Change Contracts portal (ECCCO). This will ensure improved workflow efficiency and reduce unnecessary delays and back-and-forth communication with internal clients.

**Contract Details**

The contract will be for a term of one (1) year, commencing on January 15, 2024, and ending on January 14, 2025. The contractor may be eligible for up to four (4) additional one-year extensions, subject to the same conditions.

**Security Requirements**

The selected contractor must meet the security requirements outlined in the tender document.

**Market Reservations**

This procurement is set aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual to be eligible.

**Estimated Level of Effort**

The estimated level of effort for this contract is 3,750 hours per year, broken down into 1,875 hours per resource.

**Eligibility and Qualifications**

To be eligible, the contractor must have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the E60ZT-16TSSB category and meet the specified consultant category, security level, and regional requirements.

**Tender Closing Date**

The tender closing date is December 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST).

**Award Criteria**

The award will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Marie-Christine Blais, National Manager, Procurement and Contracting Operations - East, at marie-christine.blais@ec.gc.ca or (514) 473-7087.

**Attachments**

The tender document and supporting information can be found on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24965/5000077810_npp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/249
